snippet: The Treasury Department said the two Qatar-based financiers were involved in fund-raising and other activities for Al Qaeda and its Syrian affiliate, the Nusra Front.
abstract: Treasury Department imposes sanctions on two Qatar-based financiers, saying both men have been involved in fund-raising for supporting Nusra Front and other Al Qaeda extremists in Syria, Pakistan and Sudan.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said the two Qatar-based financiers were involved in fund-raising and other activities for Al Qaeda and its Syrian affiliate, the Nusra Front.

headline.main: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on 2 Qataris for Qaeda Ties
headline.print_headline: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on Qataris Linked to Qaeda
